definition: to show understanding/to excuse/to presume/to expect
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: All the tables by the window have been booked. I hope you will understand.
sentences.chinese: 所有靠窗的台都已被预定了，希望您能谅解。
希望大家谅解一下，嘿嘿。

sentences.english: This friend talked about the unforgiven attitude of other relatives.
sentences.chinese: 这位朋友说起孩子出生后长辈的不谅解。

sentences.english: The text of the memorandums of understanding or agreements.
sentences.chinese: 谅解备忘录或协议的文本。

sentences.english: All efforts to arrive at an understanding have failed.
sentences.chinese: 一切试图达成谅解的努力都失败了。

sentences.english: The leaking well is capped. An understanding has been reached with the American government.
sentences.chinese: 泄漏油井已经封堵，公司和美国政府达成谅解。

sentences.english: An injury is forgiven more easily
sentences.chinese: 外伤比内伤更容易得到谅解。

sentences.english: Although the understanding and forgiveness of surau committee chairman Mohd Hasbi Ismail is rare, it is very much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉祈祷室理事会主席的谅解和宽恕，实属难得。

sentences.english: I tortured you for 32 years, and I can"t forgive myself."
sentences.chinese: 我熬煎了你32年，我没有办法谅解自己。

sentences.english: On the other side, important understandings with respect to mitigation and transparency.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，在减缓和透明度方面的重要谅解。

sentences.english: That understanding can lead to compassion which can lead to forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这点理解或许可以引得同情并达成对父母的谅解。

sentences.english: Please visit Everforex. com at a later time. We apologize for the inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 请稍后再访问汇联金网通，不便之处，敬请谅解。

sentences.english: I would also like to congratulate the Institute and Yanchang Petroleum Group on today's MOU signing.
sentences.chinese: 我还要祝贺研究院和延长石油今天签署谅解备忘录。

sentences.english: I want to, and this is how at least common sense, hope you forgive me the truth.
sentences.chinese: 我想，这是做人起码的常识，望你谅解我说实话。

sentences.english: We offer our apologies to you for the inconvenience of server maintenance has caused you, please understanding!
sentences.chinese: 此次服务器维护期间，给您带来的不便请谅解。

sentences.english: If so ill-conceived local services, please understanding.
sentences.chinese: 若有服务不周的地方请谅解。

definition: to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate
to settle (a dispute out of court)/to reconcile/settlement/conciliation/to become reconciled
to concede/to give in/to yield/a concession/(linguistics) concessive
